WRITING.TITLE: If a baby was born in space would it be a national of every country or a national of none?
WRITING.TEXT: [removed]
It was when I was there
not sure if looking like russel brand is an insult or not... ;P

also, i had a few good question to ask him lined up but he didnt even give me the chance to ask them, he said at the end "this is the point where you generally ask me for advice but seen as though ive already you lots i dont think there's anything more to ask or say" something very close to those lines, then he ended the interview

that would have been a great question to ask, shame i didnt think about it, i think i was just taken aback by how much he seemed to be personally near like attacking my appearence, half of that outfit was from my last retail job that i didnt even have to pay for, its hard to afford stuff on 57 a week, the problem is i'd think asking that question comes across rude and presumptuous and most probably wouldnt ask it even if it was right in the situation

i dont think he even gave me a chance with my attitude, pretty much as soon as he guided me into his office he started talking about my outfit as soon as he got off the phone, and pretty much all the way through he kept asking me why doesnt it look better, why does it look so messy and only a few questions about what i do what i enjoy doing why i want the job etc

the hair is generally MUCH shorter i just havent had the time to get round to cutting it, there is usually about 2-3 inches maybe more off i generally try and speak as professionally as i can but sometimes get flustered on question and a lot of umm and ahhs, i did have a suit jacket somewhere that i had for prom but i honestly dont know if that would work anymore, or if it would even still fit me, its truly the best looking jacket i could find

Thanks for feedback, i just threw these items back on at home, i had my shirt tucked in as per the norm, apart from that look pretty much the same apart from my hair was covering all my forehead instead of swept aside like that

i honestly didnt have time i got the call at about 5pm last night was busy all day, with interview at 1:30 today and those are the tidiest shoes i own, i did own some others from school but they are scuffed to all hell, even polish wont fix it, shirt was tucked in and i shaved what possible in time frame before my razor ended up running out of battery and no normal ones left in house
just a retail assistant at hugo boss retail and im 21

i did absolutely terrible, he didnt stop talking about how bad my outfit was how sloppy put together it was and how disconjointed it was and said i should have just got in casual clothes, but i honestly dont see what is wrong with it.
Thank you! i thought the language was Arkanian but that appears to be something with star wars
didnt know that was a thing.. thanks for the information though
